entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
